article: iraqi president saddam hussein 's elder son uday on tuesday urged the iraqi parliament to accept the newly-adopted un security council resolution #### as the lawmakers met for the second day to debate the stance on the tough resolution to disarm iraq .
abstract: saddam 's son calls for acceptance of un resolution
